title: whanau
author: whanau
content: Hello,As an experiment, I have downloaded and built this miner.https://github.com/tmrlvi/kaspa-minerIt starts but when I run it i get an error: 2023-03-31T23:14:51Z INFOÂ  kaspa_miner] Found plugins: [][2023-03-31T23:14:51Z INFOÂ  kaspa_miner] Plugins found 0 workers[2023-03-31T23:14:51Z ERROR kaspa_miner] No workers specifiedError: "No workers specified"How do I specify a worker?? What am I doing wrong??Thanks

comments.author: KaizenJujustsu
comments.body: Quote from: whanau on March 31, 2023, 11:16:05 PMHello,As an experiment, I have downloaded and built this miner.https://github.com/tmrlvi/kaspa-minerIt starts but when I run it i get an error: 2023-03-31T23:14:51Z INFOÂ  kaspa_miner] Found plugins: [][2023-03-31T23:14:51Z INFOÂ  kaspa_miner] Plugins found 0 workers[2023-03-31T23:14:51Z ERROR kaspa_miner] No workers specifiedError: "No workers specified"How do I specify a worker?? What am I doing wrong??ThanksI think you should try to provide some information to the program about what worker it should use. This information could include things like the worker's address, port number, and credentials.You should consult the documentation or user guide for the "kaspa_miner" program to learn how to specify a worker. The documentation should provide detailed instructions on how to configure the program and provide it with the necessary information to connect to a worker. Try to provide the program with a configuration file or command line arguments that specify the worker's information.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Try an easier solutionhttps://miningpoolstats.stream/kaspahttps://solopool.org/Â  has long provided opportunities for fast solo mining, but explore this issue for yourself.How It Works?It' s solo mining pool.It's a stratum over a coin node with many options.Each miner works independently of the others.The block reward goes to only the miner who found it.Block search time depends on your hashrate and luck.https://kas.solopool.org/help

comments.author: whanau
comments.body: but the CPU versionhttps://github.com/elichai/kaspa-minerfrom which it was forked works perfectly so I think the 'worker' must be to do with the GPU config. This is not explained (to me) in the documentation.
